channel.title: Caching on Blake Niemyjski
channel.description: Recent content in Caching on Blake Niemyjski

item.title: Caching and What It Can Do For Your Product
item.description: Today I updated Community Server Enterprise Reporting caching framework to use Telligent’s updated caching framework. This updated caching framework is truly amazing; it can handle many more requests and data than the previous version. After updating Community Server Enterprise Reporting, I started to see if the caching framework could handle more than what we were previously testing. Let me be the first to say that you can run every report we have and cache all of it with ease.
